action.action-desc: Mr. Bell (for himself and Mr. Graves) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To prohibit Department of Defense contracts with certain foreign-owned online tutoring services.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Turning Untrusted Tutoring Origins Away from Resources Act of 2025 or the TUTOR Act of 2025.

section.header: Prohibition on Department of Defense contracts with certain foreign-owned online tutoring services
section.text: Section 854 of the Servicemember Quality of Life Improvement and National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2025 (Public Law 118–159; 10 U.S.C. 4651 note prec.) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking The Secretary and inserting (a) In general.—The Secretary;
by striking the People’s Republic of China and inserting a country of concern; and
by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.text: In this section, the term country of concern means any of the following:
